driver = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="cd01f241cc99ebd038af7eb3852a3a12")>
navigate_to_approval = None

    @allure.epic("协同办公")
    @allure.feature("我的工作")
    @allure.story("我的审批")
    @allure.description("根据文件类型查询")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("driver",['chrome'],indirect=True)
    def test_file_search_by_type(driver, navigate_to_approval):
        """测试按文件类型"""
        wait = WebDriverWait(driver, 20)
        time.sleep(3)
        try:
            # 文件类型查询查询测试
            file_type = wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//*[@id="app"]//div[label[@for="file_type"]]//input')))
            file_type.click()
            wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable(
                (By.XPATH, '//ul[contains(@class, "el-select-dropdown__list")]/li/span[text()="岗位变动"]'))).click()
            wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//form//button[contains(@class,"el-button--primary")]'))).click()
            wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH, '//form//button[contains(@class,"el-button--success")]'))).click()
            time.sleep(2)
            text = wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located(
                (By.XPATH,'//tbody/tr[1]/td[3]//span/span')))
            n = text.text
            if "岗位变动" not in n :
                highlight_element(driver,text)
                allure.attach(driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="文件类型查询失败截图",attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
                reset_element(driver, text)
            assert "岗位变动" in n
        except Exception as e:
            # 截图并附加到 Allure 报告
>           raise e
